mapper.insert:
insert into schedule_mem from schedule_mem me, member m values(#{sche_mem_mno}, #{sche_mem_gno}, schedule_mem_seq.nextval); where mem_id = #{m.mem_id}
insert into schedule_mem from schedule_mem me, member m values(m.mem_no, ,schedule_mem_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select m.* from schedule_mem me, member m
